publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1126# Shona Robison: Population of Dundee-That the Parliament notes with concern the figures revealed by the Registrar General showing that Dundee's population is set to decline by 20,000 over the next 15 years and therefore calls for an urgent enquiry into the causes of Dundee's depopulation and for all appropriate action necessary to be taken to reverse this decline.
S1M-1126# Population of Dundee (lodged on 24 August 2000) Michael Russell*, Christine Grahame*, Irene McGugan*

S1M-1126# Shona Robison: Population of Dundee-That the Parliament notes with concern the figures revealed by the Registrar General showing that Dundee's population is set to decline by 20,000 over the next 15 years and therefore calls for an urgent enquiry into the causes of Dundee's depopulation and for all appropriate action necessary to be taken to reverse this decline. Supported by: Michael Russell, Christine Grahame, Irene McGugan, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-1126# Population of Dundee (lodged on 24 August 2000) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-1126# Population of Dundee (lodged on 24 August 2000) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-1126# Population of Dundee (lodged on 24 August 2000) Alex Neil*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Richard Lochhead*

S1M-1126# Shona Robison: Population of Dundee-That the Parliament notes with concern the figures revealed by the Registrar General showing that Dundee's population is set to decline by 20,000 over the next 15 years and therefore calls for an urgent enquiry into the causes of Dundee's depopulation and for all appropriate action necessary to be taken to reverse this decline. Supported by: Michael Russell, Christine Grahame, Irene McGugan, Fiona McLeod, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Andrew Wilson, Alex Neil, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-1126# Population of Dundee (lodged on 24 August 2000) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-1126# Population of Dundee (lodged on 24 August 2000) Tricia Marwick*, Brian Adam*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-1126# Population of Dundee (lodged on 24 August 2000) Mr Duncan Hamilton*

S1M-1126# Shona Robison: Population of Dundee-That the Parliament notes with concern the figures revealed by the Registrar General showing that Dundee's population is set to decline by 20,000 over the next 15 years and therefore calls for an urgent enquiry into the causes of Dundee's depopulation and for all appropriate action necessary to be taken to reverse this decline. Supported by: Michael Russell, Christine Grahame, Irene McGugan, Fiona McLeod, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Andrew Wilson, Alex Neil, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Ms Sandra White, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Gil Paterson, Tricia Marwick, Brian Adam, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Duncan Hamilton

S1M-1126# Shona Robison: Population of Dundee—That the Parliament notes with concern the figures revealed by the Registrar General showing that Dundee’s population is set to decline by 20,000 over the next 15 years and therefore calls for an urgent enquiry into the causes of Dundee’s depopulation and for all appropriate action necessary to be taken to reverse this decline. Supported by: Michael Russell, Christine Grahame, Irene McGugan, Fiona McLeod, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Andrew Wilson, Alex Neil, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Ms Sandra White, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Gil Paterson, Tricia Marwick, Brian Adam, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Duncan Hamilton
